Ian Angus (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1945) bụ onye Canada na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, onye na-elekọta redio egwu egwu, na onye nyocha nkwukọrịta.
Angus bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Climate & Capitalism, onye na-enye aka na nyocha kwa ọnwa, na onye isi oche nke Global Ecosocialist Network.
Site n'afọ 1994 ruo 2007, ọ kwadoro mmemme egwu blues na CKLN-FM na CIUT-FM na Toronto
Site n'afọ 1997 ruo afọ 2007 ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Nominating Panel maka Maple Blues Awards, mmemme onyinye mba Canada.

Site na 1980 ruo 2007, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Angus TeleManagement Group, ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ na agụmakwụkwọ na-ahụ maka nkwukọrịta. Ya na onye mmekọ ya bụ Lis Angus jikọrọ aka dezie akwụkwọ akụkọ Telemanagement kwa ọnwa na akwụkwọ akụkọ Telecom Update kwa izu
N'afọ 2005, a kpọbatara ha n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ nke Telecommunications nke Canada na ngalaba Advocates and Academics.
